bio: Yo everyone ❤️ I'm a web developer that love create products with help of seo. You can see my projects below.

sections.title: My companies & Projects
sections.description: I try to create web applications with the goal to become the top on       the market.

blocks.title: Foudroyer • $3000/m
blocks.description: Foudroyer lets you centralize in one place everything you need to reach the top 1 on search engines.

blocks.title: Sudoku Academy • $250/m
blocks.description: Whether you are a beginner or an advanced player, come and have fun solving sudoku puzzles online for free.

blocks.title: Temple du Haïku • $30/m
blocks.description: The Haiku Temple is a community site for haiku enthusiasts to read and publish haikus, and to view examples of haikus from authors like Matsuo Basho.

blocks.title: Munbeob • 1000 visitors per month
blocks.description: Learn and research how to conjugate Korean verbs. Over 2000 verbs with all forms, politeness and examples.
